snippet.title: Dungeon Of Dragon Knight Trailer 02
snippet.description:
Dungeon Of Dragon Knight is a dungeon crawler role play game, based on grid system. It will be launched on steam in January 2019.
Hope you will like it.

Steam store page：https://store.steampowered.com/app/823610/Dungeon_Of_Dragon_Knight/
Follow us on Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/iGameSOHO/
Follow us on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/hexgamestudio
